( AFP)- British Prime Minister David Cameron has been damaged by his media chief's resignation over phone-hacking at a tabloid newspaper he headed and the row is unlikely to go away, commentators said Saturday. So far, our worst day in government, a senior aide from David Cameron 's Downing Street office told The Guardian, after Andy Coulson quit as chief of communications on Friday. If we would decide to seek the governorship, Mike Pence said, "I would expect people can judge whatever we would bring to the candidacy at that time." From USA TODAY and Associated Press

" Bill Stephan , a friend of Mike Pence 's since they attended the Indiana University School of Law-Indianapolis together, said Mike Pence was always clear on what he stood for and what he was passionate about. I just remember Mike Pence as someone who, even then, wore his heart on his sleeve, Bill Stephan said.
